name: Trying to type in middle of text should not send the cursor to end of textbox

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)
customFields.Cypress Reports: RELEASE - TM4J-Key-Mapped-In-Cypress-Release - TM4J key found Cypress release run report  (SDET/QA)

inline.description:
Trying to type in middle of text should not send the cursor to end of textbox
--------------------
1. Start typing in the post textbox
2. Click in the middle of the text you started typing
3. Start typing again
inline.expectedResult: Cursor stays where it is and it should not move to the end of text
